subject: FW: Attn: Leah - Fwd: Ready to Print SO - 12THERMONL - PO ref 26625 and 26521

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Thanks so much for reaching out.

It looks like the SKU wasn’t added when the product was originally created, which is why it didn’t appear in the exported file.
We’ve now updated the previous CSV to match the correct title and added the missing SKU.

For reference, here are the CSV files we reviewed:
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_14_11_42_51.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_15_09_08_44.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_15_15_12_02.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_16_09_39_39.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_16_10_40_49.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_16_20_45_18.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_17_14_09_18.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_17_21_17_05.csv 
FTP-orders-thermacell-ecommerce-export-2025_11_30_12_26_54.csv
If you’d like us to double-check anything else or update additional files, just let me know — happy to help.

Thanks,
Joel

@wolfiq - Joel,

Can we check why the SKU is missing on this product in the SFTP file:

  • Website:
    • https://thermacellrepellents.com.au
  • Product:
    • https://thermacellrepellents.com.au/product/rechargeable-repellent-refill-2-x-40hr/

Hi Bonnie,

Thank you for reaching out to us with your concern.

We understand that an order has come through without a SKU code, and we can see how that would be confusing. we will look into this issue right away to determine what might have caused this and how we can prevent it from happening in the future.

I'll update you as soon as I have more information on this matter.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi team,


I am unsure why, but an order for the below product has come through on the SFTP file without a SKU code. Can you please look into this and let me know what has happened?





Thanks


Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

0408 331 966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Leah,
Just wondering, did you manually process SO's 2209719 and 2209718?
These were entered as



Hi Bonnie,
I think the order may not have been auto processed in Pronto because of column AP 'item_sku' which is blank.
Can you please check if the item code is available on the website or correct it accordingly.





Regards
